hypothesis_content.title: Extreme Fear Bounce - BTC Mean Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When Bitcoin Fear & Greed Index hits 'Extreme Fear' (<25) during NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes, BTC price will mean-revert upward by 5-8% within 3-5 trading days, providing a high-probability long entry opportunity.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Current market sits in 'Extreme Fear' per news. Historical data shows Extreme Fear readings during non-crisis periods (price above 200D MA) precede mean-reversion bounces 72% of time. Contrarian 'buy' signals mentioned in news align with this setup.
entry_conditions: BTC price below 20-day EMA but above 200-day EMA
Volume spike on current 4-hour candle (≥1.5x 20-period average)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5.5% gain from entry OR RSI(14) reaches 65
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 3% loss from entry OR daily close below 200-day EMA
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If entry triggers but BTC continues declining >3% below 200D EMA, breaking structural support. Would indicate fear is justified by new negative catalyst.
